languages.text: Лорд-капитан свершил{mf||а} великий суд, решивший, кому будет принадлежать Футфол. Те, кто осмелился оспорить приговор, приняли суровую смерть.
The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан свершил{mf||а} великий суд, решивший, кому будет принадлежать Футфол. Те, кто осмелился оспорить приговор, приняли суровую смерть.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.
The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.
The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.
The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a rendu son jugement et choisi la personne qui mérite de tenir les rênes de Castel. Ceux qui ont osé contester leur peine ont été tués sans pitié.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a rendu son jugement et choisi la personne qui mérite de tenir les rênes de Castel. Ceux qui ont osé contester leur peine ont été tués sans pitié.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经做好了决定，选择了落脚港接下来的统治者。所有胆敢反抗这一决定的人，都已经被无情地消灭了。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经做好了决定，选择了落脚港接下来的统治者。所有胆敢反抗这一决定的人，都已经被无情地消灭了。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは偉大なる審判を下し、フットフォールを掌握するにふさわしい人物を決定した。その判決に異議を唱えた者は容赦なく処刑された。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは偉大なる審判を下し、フットフォールを掌握するにふさわしい人物を決定した。その判決に異議を唱えた者は容赦なく処刑された。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat das große Urteil gefällt und entschieden, wer es verdient hat, über Footfall zu herrschen. Wer es gesagt hat, gegen seine Strafe zu protestieren, wurde gnadenlos vernichtet.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat das große Urteil gefällt und entschieden, wer es verdient hat, über Footfall zu herrschen. Wer es gesagt hat, gegen seine Strafe zu protestieren, wurde gnadenlos vernichtet.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha celebrado el gran juicio y decidido quién merece sujetar las riendas de Paso. Quienes han osado desafiar su veredicto han sido aniquilados sin piedad.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has passed the great judgement and decided who deserves to hold the reins on Footfall. Those who dared to contest their sentence were destroyed without mercy.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha celebrado el gran juicio y decidido quién merece sujetar las riendas de Paso. Quienes han osado desafiar su veredicto han sido aniquilados sin piedad.
